Class Column

java.lang.Object
main.Column
Type Parameters:
T - The type of the values this column holds.
public class Column extends Object
Represents a column in a table structure with a generic value type.

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors
    Constructor
    Description
    Column(String name, String typeClass, boolean allowsBlanks, String defaultValue)
    Constructs a new Column object with a specified name, type, allowance for blanks, and default value.

  • Constructor Details

    • Column

      public Column(String name, String typeClass, boolean allowsBlanks, String defaultValue)
      Constructs a new Column object with a specified name, type, allowance for blanks, and default value.
      Parameters:
      name - The name of the column.
      typeClass - The class type of the values that will be stored in the column.
      allowsBlanks - A boolean indicating whether the column allows blank (null) values.
      defaultValue - The default value to populate cells in the column.

  • Method Details

    • getInfo

      public String getInfo()
      Retrieves a string containing information about the column.
      Returns:
      A string representing the column's name, type, blank permission, and default value.

    • getColumn

      public List<String> getColumn()
      Retrieves all the values from the cells in the column as a list of strings.
      Returns:
      A list of strings representing the values of the column's cells.

    • getName

      public String getName()

    • setName

      public void setName(String name)
      Sets the name of the column.
      Parameters:
      name - The new name to be assigned to the column.

    • addCell

      public void addCell()
      Adds a new cell to the column with the default value of the column.

    • getSize

      public int getSize()
      Returns the number of cells in the column.
      Returns:
      The size of the column as the count of its cells.

    • removeRow

      public void removeRow(int rowIndx)
      Removes a row from the column at the specified index.
      Parameters:
      rowIndx - The index of the row to be removed. It should be within the valid bounds of the list of cells.

    • updateCell

      public void updateCell(Integer rowIndex, String value)
      Updates the value of a cell at a specified row index within the column.
      Parameters:
      rowIndex - The index of the row whose cell value needs to be updated. It must be within the valid bounds of the column's cells list.
      value - The new value to be set for the cell. The value must be a string representation compatible with the column's data type.

    • getCell

      public String getCell(Integer rowIndex)
      Retrieves the value of a cell at the specified row index as a string.
      Parameters:
      rowIndex - The index of the row from which to retrieve the cell value.
      Returns:
      A string representation of the value of the specified cell.
      Throws:
      IndexOutOfBoundsException - â€“ if the index is out of range

    • changeAllowBlanks

      public void changeAllowBlanks()
      Toggles the allowance of blank values for the column.

    • getType

      public String getType()
      Retrieves the class type of the values stored in the column.
      Returns:
      The class type of the values in the column.

    • getDefaultValue

      public String getDefaultValue()
      Retrieves the default value for the column.
      Returns:
      The default value of the column cells.

    • setDefaultValue

      public void setDefaultValue(String value)
      Sets the default value for the column.
      Parameters:
      value - The default value to be set for the column as a string.

    • isValidInput

      public boolean isValidInput(String input)

    • parseInput

      public CellValue parseInput(String input)
